alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 12:58AM CDT until June 04 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... Northeastern Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Angelo State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... O.c. Fisher Reservoir and Twin Buttes Reservoir around 105 AM CDT. San Angelo around 110 AM CDT. Lake Nasworthy around 115 AM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 120 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harriet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
